list-fruits.description: Lists the fruits FarmCaveSpawn can spawn.
mod.description: Spawns random fruit tree products into the farm cave.
MaxDailySpawns.title: Max Daily Spawns
MaxDailySpawns.description: The maximum amount of fruit per day for this mod to spawn
SpawnChance.title: Spawn Chance (Percent)
SpawnChance.description: Percent chance any particular empty tile will have a fruit on it.
TreeFruitChance.title: Tree Fruit Chance (Percent)
TreeFruitChance.description: Percent chance each spawn will be a tree fruit.
IgnoreFarmCaveType.title: Ignore Farm Cave Type
IgnoreFarmCaveType.description: If enabled, spawns fruit in all cave types
EarlyFarmCave.title: Allow Early Fruit Cave
EarlyFarmCave.description: Spawns fruit even before the fruit cave cutscene.
UseMineCave.title: Use Mine Entrance
UseMineCave.description: Allows fruits to spawn in the mine entrance as well (after spawning in the Farm Cave, if Max Daily Spawns is not yet hit.
SeasonalOnly.title: Seasonal Fruit Only
SeasonalOnly.description: Restrict to this season's fruit only
AllowAnyTreeProduct.title: Allow Any Tree Product
AllowAnyTreeProduct.description: If enabled, all products from fruit trees are allowed. If disabled, restricted to just fruit.
EdiblesOnly.title: Restrict to Edible
NoBananasBeforeShrine.title: No Bananas Before Shrine
NoBananasBeforeShrine.description: Prevents bananas from showing up before one's given to the banana shrine.
PriceCap.title: Price Cap
PriceCap.description: Removes fruit if their base price is above this.
